<ProjectCard title="Workshop | IIIT Lucknow" link="https://iiitl.ac.in/workshop/" bg="linear-gradient(to right, #00C2FF -20%, #15D14A 250%)">
Designed and managed a project to create  a website for an Event hosted by IIIT Lucknow.
Designing tools used : Figma, Adobe XD.
Github Project used to manage people involved in the activity.
Langages used for the project: HTML/CSS, JS. Link Available.
</ProjectCard>
